name: Tomb Katacomb
description:
A Light Puzzle to pass the time.

Reach the other side by moving Stone Blocks, triggering Secret Passages, collecting Treasures, and avoiding Traps. 

The challenge comes from only being able to move the blocks that are in reach of the player, you can't cross them over and the bigger blocks can't pass through narrow corridors.

Levels get progressively more complex including Secret Passages triggered by weight or by specific hieroglyphs.

Don't forget to collect Treasures along the way, but beware of Traps!

Features:

* Simple Drag&Drop mechanics to slide your characters/blocks using only the mouse or one finger.

* Change your Character at any time.

* More than 60 levels and 4 Sliding Blocks Puzzles challenges between stages.

* Progressive Difficulty

* Skip levels by trading Treasures.

* Save Progress to resume at any time.

* Complete Walkthrough available on YouTube channel.
